text: @RepLeeZeldin I just Googled Suffolk county N.Y for coronavirus and everyone had underlying health problems and most people were in their 70's or 80's! I'm in my 70's! What's the big deal? We're OLD!! We're knocking on death's door anyway so quit the bullshit and get on with life!
